Subject: Romancing in the Mess Hall
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod couldn't believe himself. In all his millions of years of life,
he had only fallen for two bots before now. There was the Autobot
ArrCee, but she left him for Springer. There was Savanna, but she was
killed before they could even date. And here he was kissing a bot he
knew for only a few hours. But he liked it.
He was in love with her. He kissed her again, and again. He wispered, in
her ear, 
"Want to go to my room...?" He stoped, knowing she got the point.

OOC: Good god! He has walked right into that seductive bi***'s hands!
LOL
